net.sourceforge.gjtapi.media
Class FreeMediaTerminal

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--net.sourceforge.gjtapi.FreeTerminal
        |
        +--net.sourceforge.gjtapi.media.FreeMediaTerminal
public class FreeMediaTerminal
extends FreeTerminal
implements javax.telephony.media.MediaTerminal

A simple marker subclass of FreeTerminal that indicates that the terminal can handle media. Creation date: (2000-03-07 15:24:16)

Constructor Summary

          Create a MediaTerminal.

Constructor Detail

FreeMediaTerminal

public FreeMediaTerminal(java.lang.String n,
                         javax.telephony.Provider p)
Create a MediaTerminal. This is simply a marker for a Terminal that can have MediaService's hooked to its calls.

Must be public since the user is not in my package.

Parameters:
n - The name of the terminal.
p - The provider for the terminal.
